data.title: Rihanna & Chris Brown Spent Night After Drake Fight Together
data.meta_description: Regardless of whoever started the fight on early June 14 at W.i.P nightclub, it seems like Rihanna has chosen the man she wants to be with. She spent the night with ex-boyfriend Chris Brown at Jay-Z‘s 40/40 Club on the night of June 14, RadarOnline.com reports. “Chris and Rihanna hung out at Jay-Z’s 40/40 Club all [...]
data.text:
Regardless of whoever started the fight on early June 14 at W.i.P nightclub, it seems like Rihanna has chosen the man she wants to be with.

She spent the night with ex-boyfriend Chris Brown at Jay-Z‘s 40/40 Club on the night of June 14, RadarOnline.com reports.

“Chris and Rihanna hung out at Jay-Z’s 40/40 Club all night and it was clear that she loved the attention he was giving her,” an insider said. ”Those two have a thing for each other that will never die, no matter what, and they’re on their way to really being back together. Chris just adores her. And she tended to him, making sure the gash on his chin from the fight was okay.”

The source added, “Chris would do anything for Rihanna, and she loves the way he showers her with attention. It’s a win-win for them.”

It seems like Rihanna and Chris might be announcing they are back together very soon. Her clear cut sign of affection for Chris speaks volumes.

What do YOU think, HollywoodLifers? Do you think Chris and Rihanna should get back together?

–Dory Larrabee

RadarOnline.com➚
